metadata.title: CVE-2024-3446 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A double free vulnerability was found in QEMU virtio devices (virtio-gpu,virtio-serial-bus, virtio-crypto), where the mem_reentrancy_guard flaginsufficiently protects against DMA reentrancy issues. This issue couldallow a malicious privileged guest to crash the QEMU process on the host,resulting in a denial of service or allow arbitrary code execution withinthe context of the QEMU process on the host.

criterions.comment: qemu package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
